Felecia Davis bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, injinia na onye nkuzi
Ọ bụ onye isi nke FELECIA DAVIS STUDIO ebe ọ na-ejikọta nka, injinia, imewe na ihe owuwu
A maara Davis maka ọrụ ya na akwa kọmputa.

Davis nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị nke injinia na Mahadum Tufts n'afọ 1982; Master na Architecture na Mahadim Princeton na PhD na Design and Computation Group na School of Architecture and Planning na Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
Nnyocha Davis na-enyocha njikọ dị n'etiti akwa na ihe owuwu na ebumnuche nke ịmepụta ihe na ihe ndị na-emeghachi omume na gburugburu ha

Karịsịa, ojiji ọ na-eji Architextiles jikọtara mmepụta dijitalụ dị nro na usoro mgbakọ na mwepụ iji mepụta akwa nke nwere ike ime ka ọtụtụ ọrụ dị mfe. Ruo ugbu a, Davis emepụtala akwa nke nwere ike imeghachi omume na aka nke ndị ọrịa ụlọ ọgwụ na-abụghị ndị na-ekwu okwu; ụlọikwuu parametric nke nwere ike ịgbanwe nha na ọdịdị na nzaghachi maka mgbanwe nke ìhè na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ nọ n'okpuru ya; yana mgbidi akwa nke na-agbanwe dabere na mmetụta nke ndị nọ n'ime ụlọ ahụ. Ugbu a, Davis bụ osote prọfesọ na Stuckerman Center for Design Computing na School of Architecture and Landscape Architecture na Mahadum Pennsylvania State, ebe ọ bụkwa onye nduzi nke SOFTLAB@PSU. Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Black Reconstruction Collective. FELECIA DAVIS STUDIO abụwo onye ikpeazụ n'ọtụtụ asọmpi imepụta ihe owuwu.
